apiWarning: Downloading from an API is limited to 10.000 records due to external API limitations. Please use filtering to refine your query
downloadData: No layer selected | Download layer (.zip) | Download {count} layers (.zip)
downloadDataSection: No layer selected | Download layer section (.zip) | Download section from {count} layers (.zip)
downloadDesc: Choose one or more layers to download.
downloadNotice: Generating the file may take a while
downloadUnavailable: Downloading data is not yet available for one or more layers.
chooseLayer: Choose a layer for the selection
filterViewMessage: Select one or more layers with clock icon to enable the filters
formatsDesc: Choose download format for each layer.
labelLayerWithTime: Select from visible layers with clock icon
name: Name
preventDownload: One or more layers cannot be downloaded
selectDesc: Select a portion of the map to download. Either by drawing, or choosing a predefined section.
selectAreasDesc: Select the areas that needs to be included in the download. You can select/deselect areas by clicking on polygons in map.
selectFilter: Select a value from list below to query the layer
selectLayerWithTime: Select a layer from the list to enable the time component
